sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Instances list
sect1.para: This page shows information about the instances of deployed and invoked BPEL processes.

simplelist.member: Click to filter the instances list.
Click to clear Instances Search criteria form. This will go to the page showing information of the instances for the uploaded BPEL processes on this server.
To view the process info page click the name of the process in the listing. This will go to a page showing the state of the process, possible actions for the process and a list of instances.

To view the current status of an instance click the link on the Instance ID's row. This will go to a separate page showing the state of each activity of the instance, including variable values, partner links etc.

To view the audit trail of an instance's execution, click "View" link on the Audit's row in the listing. Auditing must have been enabled for the process for this link to be available. This will go to a separate page which shows a step by step trace of the instance's progress to date.
To select all instances from the list check "Select All".
Click to navigate among the list of instances.

sect3.title: Process name contains
sect3.para: When specified, only processes whose name contains this string will be listed.

sect3.title: Date
sect3.para: When specified Started Since or Started Before, only instances for this date wil be given.

sect3.title: Instance ID
sect3.para: Specify value from the Instance ID's list and enter a number value in the blank field next to the list in order to be included in the Instance Search criteria.
